summary: The girl group return for more adventures, this time traveling to Spain to take part in a music festival.
cast: Raven-Symoné|Adrienne Houghton|Sabrina Bryan|Kiely Williams|Belinda|Lori Alter|Abel Folk|Golan Yosef|Lynn Whitfield|Kim Manning|Rosana Pastor|Peter Vives|Richard Felix|Guillermo Ayesa|Sue Flack|Martha Carbonell|Andrea Montero|Harris Gordon|Ferran Audí|Sílvia Sabaté|Manu Fullola|Javier Coromina|Albert Viñas|Gerard Rifà|Jesús Vela|Antonio Izquierdo|Xavier Estragues|Joan López|Daniel Martín|Sara Martín|Jessica Matallín|Narcís Pascual|Guillem Pascual|Mireia Nadal|Cristina Suárez|Hector Lechon|Miquel Bordoy|The Cheetah Girls|Jimmy Hsu|Vanessa Ross|Amanda Stanton|Sergi Atencia Sánchez|Piero Verzello|Stephan Wiks
title: The Cheetah Girls 2
